title: Pure and Whole - Shanghai Centre
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian
description: The 3rd outlet of this western-style vegetarian cafe which serves dishes like veggie burgers, wraps, soups, salads, pasta, bento lunch, smoothies, and desserts. Located besides Portman Ritz Carlton hotel, so you have to go from Nanjing West road into the small entry road leading to the hotel.
